ref.mixed-citation:
Wang R
Gao N
Li Y
Cross-protection against four serotypes of dengue virus in mice conferred by a Zika DNA vaccine. Front Cell Infect Microbiol 2019; 9: 147. 31139577

note.p: This paper shows that Zika DNA vaccine elicits CD8 T cell responses and generates cross-protection against DENV1-4, which further consolidates the possibility of single vaccine against multiflaviviruses.
